column1: Policeman:	Good evening Detective," glad you could make it at this hour.;Detective:
column2: Why is it always me who is called up on times like these"," I was in the middle of my goodnights rest.;Policeman:
column3: I apologise but the matter is urgent.;Detective:
column4: alright then"," let's crack on with this shall we.;Detective:
column7: Thank you"," let's take a look.;Detective:
